title.rendered: Top Services Smart Agencies are Offering Now

content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1564515838239{padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1603741371504{margin-top: 30px !important;margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

The best agencies are constantly adapting the services they offer based on client needs. Find out what’s on their minds right now.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1603290142255{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]SharpSpring spoke to nearly 100 agencies to gain insight into which marketing services are in highest demand in 2020 and beyond, as well as which services clients are most willing to outsource.

It’s clear from our research that connecting with audiences is key right now, but what’s the best way to do that? In this new infographic you’ll learn:

  • Which new technologies are trending for agencies
  • What services agencies say their clients are most likely to outsource
  • The marketing channels making the biggest impact in 2020
  • And more!

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent hide-cta” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html el_class=”a-b-test-original”][/vc_raw_html][vc_raw_html el_class=”a-b-test-variant-1 hidden”][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”js-btn-scroll-to btn-scroll-to”][vc_column]

Send it to me
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_raw_js][/vc_raw_js][/vc_column][/vc_row]
